root.message: The SDG_TARGET field for indicator 3-2-1, translated into en
root.data: 3.2 By 2030, eliminate preventable deaths of infants and children under 5, with all countries aiming to reduce neonatal mortality to 12 per 1,000 live births or less and child mortality under 5 from 5 years to 25 per 1,000 live births at most
